title: @ShowDynamicRange
description: The script checks the dynamic range of the time series data at locations inside the brain.

minpercchange_file.title: Percent signal change dataset
minpercchange_file.description: Dataset showing the percent signal change that an increment of 1 digitized value in the time series corresponds to.

range_file.title: Dynamic range dataset
range_file.description: Dataset showing the number of discrete levels used to represent the time series.
